  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_321</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_321</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Medición de ángulos</string>
            <string language="en">Measuring angles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messende Winkel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Angles de mesure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ângulos de medição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Angoli di misurazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέτρηση των γωνιών</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones procedimientos para medir ángulos en el sistema sexagesimal. Se estudian también operaciones entre números en sistema sexagesimal y los conceptos de ángulos suplementarios y complementarios.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to teach the procedure of measuring angles in the sexagesimal system. It also teaches how to carry out operations in the sexagesimal system and the concept of supplementary and complementary angles</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">transportador</string>
            <string language="en">protractor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">grado</string>
            <string language="en">degree</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ángulo</string>
            <string language="en">angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">sexagesimal</string>
            <string language="en">sexagesimal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">medida</string>
            <string language="en">measure</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welche 
Gebrauchsimulationen, die Prozedur des Messens zu unterrichten im 
sexagesimal System winkelt. Es unterrichtet auch, wie man 
Operationen im sexagesimal System und im Konzept der Ergänzungs- und 
ergänzenden Winkel durchführt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles simulations 
d'utilisations enseigner le procédé de la mesure pêche dans le 
système sexagesimal. Il enseigne également comment effectuer 
des exécutions dans le système sexagesimal et le concept des angles 
supplémentaires et complémentaires</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que simulações dos usos 
ensinar o procedimento da medição dobra no sistema sexagesimal. 
Ensina também como realizar operações no sistema sexagesimal 
e no conceito de ângulos suplementares e complementares</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali simulazioni di usi 
insegnare la procedura di misurazione inclina nel sistema sexagesimal.
Egualmente insegna come effettuare i funzionamenti nel sistema 
sexagesimal e nel concetto degli angoli supplementari e complementari</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να διδάξει τη διαδικασία τις γωνίες στο εξηκοστό σύστημα. 
Διδάσκει επίσης πώς να διενεργήσει τις διαδικασίες στο 
εξηκοστό σύστημα και την έννοια των συμπληρωματικών και 
συμπληρωματικών γωνιών</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Winkelmesser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">sexagesimal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Maß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rapporteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">degré</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sexagesimal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
